thread.title: Byron

author: Byron
title: Byron
text: I received trees that were late in season and did not live. I asked for and received two replacement trees. One of the trees was the incorrect variety whereupon the company sent me the correct tree in a short time. I sent the incorrect variety to a local arboretum for them to add to their collection. I would gladly do business again with Willis Orchards and will recommend them to my friends and family.
